errors.noSelected: the application selected does not has distributions
errors.ALREADY_EXISTS: A distribution with this configuration already exists
errors.PORT_USED: There is already a distribution with the indicated port

en.callToAction: To run your project, press the run button on the distribution you want to use.

platform.label: Platform
platform.tooltip: Corresponds to the platform on which you want to distribute the code

http.label: Http server
http.tooltip: Port on which the http server in charge of the SSR will run.

inspect.label: Inspect port
inspect.tooltip: It will allow code inspection through the dev tools

bundles.label: DevServer port
bundles.tooltip: The DevServer returns all the resources requested in the development process
